org.apache.storm.localizer

Class AsyncLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.localizer.AsyncLocalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shutdownable, ILocalizer

    public class AsyncLocalizer
extends Object
implements ILocalizer, Shutdownable

    This is a wrapper around the Localizer class that provides the desired async interface to Slot.

      • requestDownloadBaseTopologyBlobs

        public Future<Void> requestDownloadBaseTopologyBlobs(LocalAssignment assignment,
                                                     int port)
                                              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ILocalizer

        Download storm.jar, storm.conf, and storm.ser for this topology if not done so already, and inc a reference count on them.

        Specified by:
        requestDownloadBaseTopologyBlobs in interface ILocalizer
        Parameters:
        assignment - the assignment the resources are for
        port - the port the topology is running on
        Returns:
        a future to let you know when they are done.
        Throws:
        IOException - on error

      • requestDownloadTopologyBlobs

        public Future<Void> requestDownloadTopologyBlobs(LocalAssignment assignment,
                                                 int port)
        Description copied from interface: ILocalizer

        Download the blobs for this topology (reading in list in from the config) and inc reference count for these blobs. PRECONDITION: requestDownloadBaseTopologyBlobs has completed downloading.

        Specified by:
        requestDownloadTopologyBlobs in interface ILocalizer
        Parameters:
        assignment - the assignment the resources are for
        port - the port the topology is running on
        Returns:
        a future to let you know when they are done.
